title: Help with this sans serif?
content:
I'm looking to identify the font used in the "jennifer orkin lewis" part. To me, it looks similar to Quattrocento Sans, but some of the widths aren't quite the same. Can somebody help to shed some light on this please?

[http://img1.etsystatic.com/000/0/0/iusb\_760x100.8708661.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819183230/http:/img1.etsystatic.com/000/0/0/iusb_760x100.8708661.jpg)
author: VisioPhobia
